overview.en: Puriever (PURE) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Puriever has a current supply of 1,200,000,000 with 0 in circulation. The last known price of Puriever is 0.4445635 USD and is down -14.65 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 2 active market(s) with $62,824.73 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://puriever.com.
